steps: 3. Go to Settings > API Access to get API key
4. For IndexNow: Generate a key at indexnow.org or use your own
5. Create key file at yourdomain.com/{key}.txt containing just the key
6. Set environment variables: BING_API_KEY, INDEXNOW_KEY, SITE_URL

indexnow_setup.key_file_content: Just the key string, nothing else
indexnow_setup.alternative: Or use keyLocation parameter in API calls
